tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recurring_payments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    payment_amount DECIMAL,
    payment_due_date DATE,
    payment_frequency VARCHAR(255),
    payment_reminder VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
  reminder_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  reminder_message TEXT,
  reminder_date DATE,
  associated_task VARCHAR(100),
  is_completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE recurring_payments (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    payment_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    payment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    recurring_frequency VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE scheduled_tasks (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    task_description TEXT,
    due_date DATE NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    reminder_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    reminder_description TEXT,
    reminder_date DATE NOT NULL,
    reminder_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE recurring_payments (
  payment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  payment_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  payment_frequency VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  next_payment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  customer_id INTEGER NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE scheduled_tasks (
  task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  task_description TEXT,
  task_due_date DATE NOT NULL,
  assigned_to VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE recurring_payments (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    amount DECIMAL,
    frequency VARCHAR,
    next_payment_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    customer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE scheduled_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR,
    task_description TEXT,
    task_due_date DATE,
    task_status VARCHAR,
    customer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    reminder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reminder_title VARCHAR,
    reminder_description TEXT,
    reminder_due_date DATE,
    reminder_status VARCHAR,
    customer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR,
    customer_email VARCHAR,
    customer_phone VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE tasks_reminder_mapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    reminder_id INT
);
